price: 57. Atau (agar jangan) ada yang berkata, “Sekiranya Allah memberikan petunjuk kapadaku tentulah aku termasuk orang-orang yang bertakwa,”
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
